attributes.title: I hate it
attributes.review: The app has no respect for anyone’s privacy. Tried to take me credit card numbers and my phone. They got my address and now I’m scared for my life! Do not download!

attributes.title: Dookie
attributes.review: It’s unfortunate that this orange man had an app placed out for him only for it to make sky phone glitch. The app also makes false claims stating that he’s a great president when in reality he’s a very dirty and disrespectful man. Don’t download this.

attributes.title: Trump 2020 🧚‍♂️💕👑✨😌 In a grave ✨💗💖🥰🌈
attributes.review: this app is terrible!!! I used to like trump now I don’t because of this app I HATE it. the orange rat face kept glitching in my screen and my phone broke. I’m doing this on my iPad NOW this app is NOT GOOD DONT GET IT PLEASE  they should make a “save Barron trump” app.

attributes.title: This app is bad
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see if trump was good but This app made my phone freeze and made my phone glitch and it didn’t give me any reasons why trump is good this I bye far the worst app.

attributes.title: Such a Terrible app
attributes.review: This app made my phone extremely glitchy. I had no problem prior to downloading this app. Clearly, the bugs are not fixed.

attributes.title: Never again
attributes.review: I downloaded this app hopeing to see the one and only and it the events just keep sending me the location of BLM protest movements never again

attributes.title: Worst app ever.
attributes.review: Absolutely terrible app very disappointing Apple needs to delete it ASAP because this is unacceptable the app brought a virus into my phone and my phone glitches 24/7 because of this app DELETE THE APP DISGUSTING 🤢🤮

attributes.title: Horrible.
attributes.review: The app is terrible couldn’t even use it. And I was looking for a reason to vote for him, but couldn’t. This app is useless just like the presidents been for four years. Guess I’m voting blue.

attributes.title: Trumps name
attributes.review: It was poorly made, the home screen was just all white and had only Trumps name. I was trying to find important information but everything I press leads me back to trumps name😡

attributes.title: I can’t believe it
attributes.review: Trump has turned into everything he said he was against. I can’t find one reason to vote for him again. He is not making America great.
